europeana:record.dc:title: Goellneriana deckerti gen. nov. & spec. nov. (Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Phymatinae: Macrocephalini) from Namibia, with a review of the Afrotropical ambush bugs
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Doesburg, van P.H.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Insecta; Heteroptera; Reduviidae; Phymatinae; Goellneriana deckerti; new genus; new species; Namibia; list of Afrotropical Phymatinae; distribution
europeana:record.dc:description: Goellneriana deckerti gen. nov. & spec. nov. (Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Phymatinae: Macrocephalini) from Namibia is described and illustrated. Keys to the tribes and to the Afrotropical genera and species of the subfamily Phymatinae are included, a checklist and a distribution map of the Afrotropical ambush bugs is added.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Goellneriana deckerti gen. nov. & spec. nov. (Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Phymatinae: Macrocephalini) from Namibia, with a review of the Afrotropical ambush bugs (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 78, 1-16)
